title: Forza Horizon 5 Is Xbox Game Studios BIGGEST Launch Ever - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.10.21
description:
Tim and Andy discuss Phil Spencer's tweets about Forza Horizon 5, EA Sports potentially bringing Fight Night back, and some light Star Wars Jedi Fallen Order Sequel updates.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:05 - Housekeeping

PS I Love You XOXO is up right now! It’s Janet and I going through and creating our definitive PlayStation Holiday Shopping guide. That’s up right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack

The Roper Report -
00:07:15 - BREAKING NEWS: Spider-Man Avengers https://twitter.com/PlayAvengers/status/1458494704484438018?s=20
00:10:30 - Forza Horizon 5 Is The Biggest Launch in Xbox Game Studios History
(Uncle Phil Himself, Head of Xbox Phil Spencer Twitter)
00:21:50 - Sources Say: EA has greenlit a Fight Night revival, but it’s ‘on pause’ (Tom Henderson at VGC)
00:25:45 - Halo Infinite Multiplayer Designer Joins Respawn to Work on a Star Wars Game (Matt Purslow From IGN)
00:31:00 - Ad  
00:35:30 - A Day Before Launch, GTA Definitive Edition Still Hasn't Gotten Official Gameplay--But It's Leaked Anyway (Eddie Makuch at GameSpot)
00:40:47 - Unity Buys Lord Of The Rings Effects Studio Weta To Help Create The Metaverse
00:47:26 - PlayStation Direct Store Expands to Europe (PlayStation UK Twitter)
00:48:30 - Out today
00:49:40 - Squad Up: Shawn (PS4/Twitch) - Speig14
00:50:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tam and Tim
